text: Jim Carrey has responded to a new report that says he and the late Robin Williams were engaged in a ` ` bitter feud.'' The original report seems to stem from a new biography about Williams that was written by New York Times journalist Dave Itzkoff. In Itzkoff's book, it's touched on that the late comedian felt threatened by Carrey's success in the 1990s. To make matters worse, Robin Williams was reportedly upset that Jim Carrey took over on the role of the Riddler in 1995's Batman Forever after he turned the role down. The report in question comes from Radar Online, which isn't always 100 percent accurate in all of its reporting.
